turkish_example_sentence: O sakin bir yere ihtiyaç duyarsa, dağ evine gider.
english_example_sentence: If he/she needs a quiet place, he/she goes to the mountain house.
russian_example_sentence: Если ему/ей понадобится тихое место, он/она пойдёт в горный домик.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: O sakin bir yere ______, dağ evine gider.
